From: robertdahl <rdahl@...>

"Wait a bit Nightstrike. We will have a plan for it soon." he said,
turning his attention back to the group. "All right Astrotrain, lead the
way, the Stunticons will catch up shortly." He turned to the two new
recruits. "Show me loyalty, and you will have the universe. Come, after
we show this creature to oblivion, I will give you a tour of our base,
personally." he said.
